about_the_game:
Synopsis.


The main character, Yoi, receives a letter from his dead sister, Chitose, saying that she wants to tell him a secret.
In order to find out the truth, Yoyi heads to an abandoned laboratory.

Outline


2D exploration adventure
While being chased by mysterious characters, the player must guide the two characters and use items to solve gimmicks and reach the location written in the letter.

Game Features


2D exploratory adventure
Set in a modern abandoned hospital with pixel art
A puzzle-solving element in which players solve gimmicks while being chased by pursuers
Tense atmosphere of stealth with the accompanying characters.
Newly written music for the game.

content_descriptors.notes:
・Bloodshed, violence
・Torture, detailed depictions of death
・Child abuse
・Glorification/instigation of violence
・Fictitious drug use/abuse/dependence

name: L.OD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or higher
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL compliant video card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
